reasoningText.text:
The user is asking me what their name is. I don't have any prior context about this user, so I should check if I have any stored memories about them. However, I don't have their user_id (email address) to look up their memories.

Let me ask them for their identifier so I can look up their information, or I can simply let them know I don't have that information yet and ask them to introduce themselves.
